content: Girish Varma - IIIT Hyderabad CONTACT Menu Girish Varma Assistant Professor, Ph.D (TIFR Mumbai) Email: girish.varma[at]iiit.ac.in Publications Institute Webpage Personal homepage Research areas Complexity Theory, Combinatorics, Computer Vision, Machine Learning Research Centers/Labs Center for Security, Theory and Algorithms (CSTAR) does research in information security, theory and algorithms. https://cstar.iiit.ac.in/ Machine Learning Lab (MLL) enables machines, especially computers to learn from environments and make their own decisions.
